questions.question_text:
An administrator configured a Symptom with a Wait Cycle of 3 and a Cancel Cycle of 2. The default cycle was not changed.
How many minutes will it take for both to be triggered?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
To determine the time it will take for both the Wait Cycle and Cancel Cycle to be triggered, we need to understand the default cycle duration in vRealize Operations. The default cycle is typically set to 5 minutes.

Wait Cycle of 3: 3 cycles * 5 minutes per cycle = 15 minutes
Cancel Cycle of 2: 2 cycles * 5 minutes per cycle = 10 minutes
Therefore, the correct answer is:
C. Wait: 15 minutes, Cancel: 10 minutes.

https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.core.doc/GUID-251F60F2-529B-4D47-B669-7065AB1B5EAC.html

questions.question_text:
An administrator has been tasked with configuring service discovery to identify which virtual machines are running Active Directory services. All virtual machines are running on vSphere 6.5.
Which credentials, if any, are needed for the administrator to complete this task?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Credential-less discovery doesn't work with vSphere 6.5 and Domain Controllers doesn't have local accounts.

Selected Answer: C
It is C, https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Aria-Operations/8.12/Configuring-Operations/GUID-E02AF39E-748F-406B-9464-84DE826C82AC.html

Selected Answer: A
For me it A - https://blogs.vmware.com/management/2020/10/credential-less-service-discovery-with-vrealize-operations.html

choices.C: Active Directory domain administrator account and password.
choices.D: Active Directory domain user account and password.
choices.B: Local Windows administrator account and password.
choices.A: No credentials are needed since credential-less service discovery can be used.

questions.question_text:
An administrator is configuring Workload Optimization to maximize the workload performance.
Which configuration proactively moves workloads so that the resource utilization ensures maximum headroom for all resources?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
correct answer Balance - Select Balance when workload performance is your first goal. This approach proactively moves workloads so that the resource utilization is balanced, leading to maximum headroom for all resources.

choices.C: This information is not available in any report.

questions.question_text:
An administrator would like to find out which colleague took the vRealize Operations cluster offline the previous night.
Which audit report, if any, will provide this information?

choices.D: Click the Add New Nodes button on the System Status page in the administration User Interface of an existing node.
choices.C: Use any local or directory user with the Administrator role in vRealize Operations when prompted in each new node.
choices.A: Generate passphrases in the administration User Interface of an existing node, and enter them when prompted in each new node.
choices.E: Use the vRealize Operations root user name and password when prompted in each new node.
choices.B: Click the Add New Nodes button on the Cluster Management page in the product User Interface of an existing node.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
For me also only Passphrase and new nodes.

Selected Answer: AD
Passphrase and new nodes can ONLY be added from the Administration UI.

questions.question_text:
A company has just acquired a competitor with a vSphere environment and would like to have the new vSphere environment also monitored by the company's original three-node vRealize Operations cluster. The vRealize Operations Sizing tool determines two additional data node, and a remote collector needs to be added to the vRealize Operations cluster.
The nodes are deployed accordingly, and the administrator now needs to create a trust relationship between the cluster and each of these new nodes.
Which two methods will meet this goal? (Choose two.)
